title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Designing and Implementing Effective e-Service Learning in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish more than three specific performance indicators for service-learning activities in online environments
Learners can explain methods to evaluate the effectiveness of e-service learning by applying mixed research methodologies
Learners can design activities that promote collaborative problem-solving in a smartphone-based LMS
Learners can develop educational plans considering the balance between tangibility and ambiguity in service activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
